sentences.en: As 2010 begins, Uranus is still in Pisces and your twelfth house.
sentences.cn: 由于2010年开始, 天王星在双鱼座仍是和你的第12宫.

sentences.en: Can I have a look at Uranus too, Lavender? said Ron.
sentences.cn: ‘可以把天王星也让我看一眼吗,拉文德? ’罗恩说.

sentences.en: From Voyager, we now know a lot more about Uranus.
sentences.cn: 从旅行者2号那里, 我们知道了不少有关天王星的情况.

sentences.en: However, Neptune does not turn on its side the way Uranus does.
sentences.cn: 然而, 海王星不像天王星那样朝一边倾斜旋转.

sentences.en: Let us test Kepler's third law for the orbit of uranus compared with that of earth.
sentences.cn: 让我们比较天王星和地球的轨道,来检验一下开普勒第三定律.

sentences.en: New discoveries about Uranus excited planetary astronomers in 1977.
sentences.cn: 一九七七年对天王星的几项新发现振奋了行星天文学家.

sentences.en: On Uranus, the magnetic line is almost eight - thousand kilometers off - center.
sentences.cn: 而在天王星上, 磁力线偏离地心将近800公里.

sentences.en: There are 15 moons and 11 rings surrounding Uranus.
sentences.cn: 它有15颗卫星以及11个环绕该星球的光环.

sentences.en: There is an opposition formed between Venus and Uranus in your chart.
sentences.cn: 在你的命盘中,金星跟天王星之间形成对分相.

sentences.en: Those who master Uranus'teachings often make charming and charismatic leaders.
sentences.cn: 谁掌握这些天王星的教导往往迷人魅力的领袖.

sentences.en: Uranus has 27 known moons, all of them around planet's equator.
sentences.cn: 天王星已知有27个卫星, 全部围绕天王星赤道运行.

sentences.en: Uranus however is heating up and melting her icy surface.
sentences.cn: 不过天王星正在升温并溶化表面的冰层.

sentences.en: Uranus is unusual because it is tilted.
sentences.cn: 天王星非常特殊,因为它是倾斜的.

sentences.en: Uranus, Neptune and Pluto are never visible to the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 天王星 、 海王星和冥王星肉眼从来都不会看到.

sentences.en: When it comes to Uranus, you can never accurately predict the outcome.
sentences.cn: 当它来到天王星, 你永远也不能准确地预言结果.

trans.tran_cn: 天王星，（希腊神话）乌拉诺斯神
